job_title: Fundraising Manager in Casablanca, Greater Casablanca
pros: Great collaboration and team/family kind of spirit
cons: Care model puts a lot of pressure on staff.

review_title: I interned at SOS Children's Villages Morocco.
pros: Great team all very committed to the non-profit's mission. My manager was very receptive and included me in all aspects of the organisation.
cons: The organisation is understaffed requiring higher-level employees to take on routine tasks.
